body:
Mostapha, 



I got excited and started looking at some of the xml export attempts I had done before to get geometry into OS. Found one for you that definitely crashes the Rhino in case you are interested in looking more into it and potentially help you fine-tune things in the new component! it is a much bigger file that may be the reason why translation becomes too taxing! [https://www.dropbox.com/s/n0wyz0l9s3oxknv/Revit_xml.xml?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/n0wyz0l9s3oxknv/Revit_xml.xml?dl=0)
